title: Exploring Improvements for the Patient Advice and Liaison Service (PALS): A Qualitative Research-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Public Healthcare Systems and Foundational Qualitative Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: Learners, as general citizens interested in public healthcare service improvement, analyze PALS (Patient Assessment and Liaison Services) operational status and development directions through projects.

learning_goals: Explain three or more core functions of PALS and their mechanisms for contributing to organizational learning
Analyze barriers to PALS operations by applying qualitative research methods (interviews, framework analysis)
Propose two or more PALS improvement strategies for resolving conflicts among stakeholders in healthcare organizations

resources: PALS (Peer-Assisted Learning Support) Operations Manual Sample

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
